priorVersion.title: CDISC SEND Organ Measurement Test Code Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C89977

self.title: CDISC SEND Organ Measurement Test Code Terminology

definition: Terminology for the test codes concerned with the measurement of organs.
name: Organ Measurement Test Code
preferredTerm: CDISC SEND Organ Measurement Test Code Terminology

terms.definition: The linear extent in space from one end of something to the other end, or the extent of something from beginning to end. (NCI)
A numeric comparison of the weight of an organ to the weight of the brain.
A numeric comparison of the weight of an organ to body weight.
A numeric comparison of the weight of an organ to the weight of the heart.
The dimension between two surfaces of an object, usually the smallest dimension as opposed to the width or the length.
The mean number in a group of values that represent the thickness of an object.
The vertical force exerted by a mass as a result of gravity. (NCI)
